tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE asset_depreciation ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    asset_name VARCHAR(255), 
    purchase_date DATE, 
    purchase_value DECIMAL(10, 2), 
    depreciation_rate DECIMAL(5, 2), 
    current_value DECIMAL(10, 2) 
);

CREATE TABLE asset_depreciation (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_value DECIMAL,
    purchase_date DATE,
    depreciation_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE asset_depreciation (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    current_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    depreciation_rate DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE value_changes (
    value_change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT,
    change_date DATE,
    previous_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    new_value DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
    financial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE asset_depreciation (
 asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 asset_name VARCHAR(255),
 purchase_date DATE,
 purchase_value DECIMAL(10,2),
 depreciation_rate DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE depreciation_records (
 record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 asset_id INT,
 depreciation_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
 depreciation_date DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES asset_depreciation(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE value_change (
 change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 asset_id INT,
 new_value DECIMAL(10,2),
 change_date DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES asset_depreciation(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
 data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 asset_id INT,
 revenue DECIMAL(10,2),
 expenses DECIMAL(10,2),
 profit_loss DECIMAL(10,2),
 report_date DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES asset_depreciation(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE asset_depreciation (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_date DATE,
    initial_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    depreciation_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
    current_value DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE depreciation_schedule (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT REFERENCES asset_depreciation(id),
    depreciation_date DATE,
    depreciation_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE value_changes (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT REFERENCES asset_depreciation(id),
    change_date DATE,
    new_value DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE financial_entries (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT REFERENCES asset_depreciation(id),
    entry_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE asset_categories (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)
